column1: Uroflow Ethics/IRB Submission Pack Index v1.0
1) Review each region sheet (RU_EC, EU_Ethics, US_IRB).
2) Update site-specific fields in DOCX templates (PI, site, contacts).
3) Mark Status as READY / TBD, and Include_in_pack as Y/N.
4) Optional: run the builder script to assemble a region ZIP.
Use Claim Set A only (no diagnostic claims). Full-frame video is not collected by default.
